abstract.t: This memo reiterates the assignment of an IPv4 address block (192.0.0.0/24) to IANA. It also instructs IANA to restructure its IPv4 and IPv6 Special-Purpose Address Registries. Upon restructuring, the aforementioned registries will record all special- purpose address blocks, maintaining a common set of information regarding each address block. This memo obsoletes RFC 4773, RFC 5156, RFC 5735 and RFC 5736.
